# tf.contrib.eager.num_gpus

``` python
tf.contrib.eager.num_gpus()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/eager/context.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/python/eager/context.py).

Get the number of available GPU devices.

#### Returns:

The number of available GPU devices.
